√liś 'tear'

present: liliśire  

aorist: [3.] alīliśat   -- [5.] aleśiṣi   -- [7.] alikṣata  

[future: lekṣyate  leṣṭā  ]

verbal: liṣṭá  

[secondary: leliś-  lilikṣa-  leśaya-  ]

derivatives: ku}-){liśa? V.+  leśa B.+  leṣṭu E.+  

Compare the other root-form, riś.
